thread.title: Here’s How To Profit From The Market’s M&A Craze
thread.title_full: Here’s How To Profit From The Market’s M&A Craze

title: Here’s How To Profit From The Market’s M&A Craze
text: September 25, 2015 at 19:41 PM EDT Here’s How To Profit From The Market’s M&A Craze Investing in M&A deals can be a misunderstood and low return strategy, but current spreads on some deals are too good to pass up. Marshall Hargrave is looking at five possible deals that, if approved, mean quick gains for investors who buy in now.
